1.title: A Music Revolution
1.plot: A family of music industry veterans decides it is time to spearhead a revolution within a broken music industry. Their vision is to give the power of music back to the artists and the people by giving them both a say in what the company does with each act they develop. An inside look at what 99% of artists are faced with on their Highway to Fame. Directions International meets with artists for the first time.

2.title: It's All on the Line
2.plot: A family of music industry veterans decides it is time to spearhead a revolution within a broken music industry. Their vision is to give the power of music back to the artists and the people by giving them both a say in what the company does with each act they develop. An inside look at what 99% of artists are faced with on their HIGHWAY TO FAME. Directions International meets with artists for the first time.

3.title: Interns Know It All
3.plot: The Directions International staff continues to find more artists. Holly introduces a singer Claudia, from St. Lucia. The interns get a chance to pick their favorite unsigned artists and present them.

4.title: Open Call: Anyone?
4.plot: Directions International, a family of music industry veterans meets with artists for the first time. The company decides it is time to lead a revolution and give power back to the artists and the people.

5.title: Expansion
5.plot: Directions International, a family of music industry veterans meets with artists for the first time. The company decides it is time to lead a revolution and give power back to the artists and the people.

6.title: Filling in the Gaps
6.plot: Directions International artist Autumn Nicholas comes to town to work with professional song writers and vocal coaches.

7.title: Leaving the Nest
7.plot: Seth explains the separation of work and family, as he and his wife welcome their new baby. Tony and Holly put aside their recent differences and travel to Alabama to see Abrielle Mullins perform.

8.title: A New Look
8.plot: Excitement continues to surround artist Billy Droze as he showcases for the DI team. Abrielle Mullins meets with a stylist for a makeover although her parents are keeping close tabs on the process.

9.title: A Helping Hand
9.plot: Rich York comes to town after a hiatus to work again with the Directions International team. Seth dives deeper in the career of artist Billy Droze as he struggles to bring his family to the United States.

10.title: A Studio, a Rehearsal and a Contract
10.plot: Billy Droze records in Nashville with his friend and Producer David Norris. Abrielle Mullins takes the next step with Directions International as the struggles continue to separate from her parents.

11.title: On the Road
11.plot: Seth finds a new band through website submissions. Tony relies on his touring background to put together a band and transport them down to Alabama for Abrielle Mullins' show.

12.title: One Journey Ends, Another Begins
12.plot: Artist Claudia Edward is sent to Baltimore for a writing session before her performance in Nashville. Billy Droze continues to wait on his family from Lithuania. Fred is faced with the possiblilty of loosing a team member.

13.title: Oh, By the Way
13.plot: Claudia Edward showcases for Directions International with a new band. The team finally gets to see a performance by Mike Farrell, the artist in the opening of the show.

locations: New York City, New York, USA
imdb.plot outline: By the time music lovers hear their favorite bands' CD, catch their latest music video or experience them live in concert, the artist or band has endured a process that most fans could never begin to imagine. Welcome to 'Highway to Fame', an in-depth, up close and personal adventure through the mayhem of the broken music industry as a new Global Entertainment Company run by an extraordinary family takes a swing at changing the game.
imdb.title: Highway to Fame
plot: By the time music lovers hear their favorite bands' CD, catch their latest music video or experience them live in concert, the artist or band has endured a process that most fans could never begin to imagine. Welcome to '_Highway to Fame_ (qv)', an in-depth, up close and personal adventure through the mayhem of the broken music industry as a new Global Entertainment Company run by an extraordinary family takes a swing at changing the game.::Marianna Conley
